Copying or Printing a Chart

Note: This topic applies to charting in the Windows client only.

After displaying a chart that illustrates application data, you can copy that chart to the clipboard, so that it can be imported into another program, or print the chart as it appears on screen.

To copy the displayed chart to the clipboard:

Do one of the following:

  • Click the Copy Bitmap button on the Chart window toolbar. You can then paste the chart into any program that accepts .bmp files.

  • Click the Copy Data as Text button on the Chart window toolbar. You can then paste the data into any program that accepts .txt files.

To print the displayed chart:

Click the Print button on the Chart window toolbar. The chart prints on your currently selected printer.
